summary: Adds Fün and Crotch from the Youtube series \'Skyrim for Pimps\' as followers.
descriptionHtml:
Shoutout to Adam, Aaron and/or Emre for linking this mod on their facebook page.
[url=https://www.facebook.com/#!/GameSocietyFilms]GameSocietyFilms Facebook page[/url]



Hey nexus

I am a huge fan of the youtube series called Skyrim for Pimps by GameSocietyFilms.  The series follows the adventures of two characters, Fün Tits and Crotch Guzzler.  This mod simply adds both individuals to the Bannered Mare in Whiterun.

If you are not a fan of the series, this mod will make abolutely no sense.  This is more of a novelty for the fans.

Both characters were made with my lazy skills with the Skyrim NPC editor.  Fün wears the wench outfit, but will switch to the daedric armour when she follows you.  She duel wields a daedric waraxe and daedric sword with fire enchantments.  In addition she carries some of her calling card, nightshade, and a gold ring. (the f***ing gold rich b*tch)
Crotch simply wears apprentice robes of destruction.

I have no idea what I\'m doing, this is merely a novelty which someone may enjoy.

[url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xpVdpBTzYgY&feature=BFa&list=PLnMlh8dHsRY9QiTsFEzjrPEVXLPUSKS_C]Link to the youtube series.[/url]
author: mj

files.name: Skyim for Pimps - Fun and Crotch
